Package net.chaossquad.mclib.entity

Klasse RespawningManagedEntity<ENTITY_TYPE extends org.bukkit.entity.Entity>

java.lang.Object
net.chaossquad.mclib.entity.ManagedEntity<ENTITY_TYPE>
net.chaossquad.mclib.entity.RespawningManagedEntity<ENTITY_TYPE>
Typparameter:
ENTITY_TYPE - entity type
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
ManagedListener, Removable, SchedulerInterface, org.bukkit.event.Listener
public class RespawningManagedEntity<ENTITY_TYPE extends org.bukkit.entity.Entity> extends ManagedEntity<ENTITY_TYPE>
A managed entity that respawns every time it is killed.

  • Verschachtelte Klassen - Übersicht

    Methode
    Beschreibung
    final @NotNull org.bukkit.World
    getWorld()
    Returns the world.
    boolean
    isEnabled()
    Returns the enabled status.
    void
    setEnabled(boolean enabled)
    Sets the enabled status.
    protected final void
    tick()
    Handles entity instance.
    If the entity is enabled, it is spawned if it does not exist.
    If the entity is disabled, it will be killed if it is existing.
    This is called every 200 ticks, but it can be called manually by subclasses if necessary.

  • Methodendetails

    • tick

      protected final void tick()
      Handles entity instance.
      If the entity is enabled, it is spawned if it does not exist.
      If the entity is disabled, it will be killed if it is existing.
      This is called every 200 ticks, but it can be called manually by subclasses if necessary.
